attributes.action: charge those MPs whom were found to have claimed expenses which they were later ordered to repay, with the £1.1m cost of the Sir Thomas Legg enquiry / report together with interest on the expenses. It is not right for these costs to be born by the tax payer. It will also send a message to anyone else who may consider immoral practices with public funds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should not expect the tax payer to pay out the cost of the enquiry just because the MPs have been ordered to repay the expenses. These are additional costs that have been incurred purely due to those individuals excercising a lack of moral judgement.
